author: Peter Hill
description: This particular Expense Account has a distinctly festive flavour with notes of sweet cinnamon (not an ingredient) and is best described as being an expensive "Festive Rum Old Fashioned."
name: Expense Account
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Chilled water (reduce if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
